targets.query: SELECT sum("value") /60*10 FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "type" = 'HP' AND "interval_length" = 'PT10M') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") /60*30 FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "type" = 'HP' AND "interval_length" = 'PT30M') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value")  /1000/60*10*$price_HP FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "type" = 'HP' AND "interval_length" = 'PT10M') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") /60*10/$surface_maison /1000 FROM "autogen"."consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "interval_length" = 'PT10M') AND time <= now() and time >= now() - 365d GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("value") /60*30/$surface_maison /1000 FROM "autogen"."consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "interval_length" = 'PT30M') AND time <= now() and time >= now() - 365d GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT "value" /60*10 FROM "autogen"."consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "subscribed_power" FROM "autogen"."consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("value") /60*10 FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "interval_length" = 'PT10M') GROUP BY "month", "year"
SELECT sum("value") /60*30 FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "interval_length" = 'PT30M') GROUP BY "month", "year"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "interval_length" = 'PT60M') GROUP BY "month", "year"
SELECT sum("value")  / 2 AS kWh FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")  / 2 /1000 * $price_STD AS "Tarif Base (€/J)" FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")  / 2 /1000 * $price_HC AS "Heure Creuse" FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE $timeFilter AND "type" = 'HC' GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")  / 2 /1000 * $price_HP AS "Heure Pleine"  FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE $timeFilter AND "type" = 'HP' GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
SELECT value FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") / 2 FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d,-1h) fill(null)
